org.apache.xpath.functions

Class XSL3FunctionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.xpath.functions.XSL3FunctionService

  • public class XSL3FunctionService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides support to evaluate XPath 3.1 "XML Schema constructor function calls" and "named function references", and "XSL stylesheet function calls".

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XObject callFunction(XSL3ConstructorOrExtensionFunction xpathExpr, TransformerImpl transformerImpl, XPathContext xctxt)
      Process a call to an XPath constructor function, or an XSL stylesheet function.
      XObject evaluateXPathNamedFunctionReference(XPathNamedFunctionReference xpathNamedFuncRef, java.util.List<java.lang.String> argList, java.util.List<XMLNSDecl> prefixTable, java.util.Vector varVecor, int varGlobalsSize, ExpressionNode expressionNode, XPathContext xctxt)
      Method definition to evaluate an XPath named function reference.
      boolean isFuncArityWellFormed(java.lang.String funcRefStr)
      Method definition to syntactically check, well-formedness of function arity of the function to be called, for named function references specified with syntax functionNameString#integerLiteral.

    • Method Detail

      • callFunction

        public XObject callFunction(XSL3ConstructorOrExtensionFunction xpathExpr,
                            TransformerImpl transformerImpl,
                            XPathContext xctxt)
                     throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Process a call to an XPath constructor function, or an XSL stylesheet function.
        Parameters:
        transformerImpl - xsl transformation implementation object
        xpathExpr - xpath expression object
        xctxt - xpath context object
        Returns:
        evaluation result of an XPath function call handled by this method.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • isFuncArityWellFormed

        public boolean isFuncArityWellFormed(java.lang.String funcRefStr)
        Method definition to syntactically check, well-formedness of function arity of the function to be called, for named function references specified with syntax functionNameString#integerLiteral.

      • evaluateXPathNamedFunctionReference

        public XObject evaluateXPathNamedFunctionReference(XPathNamedFunctionReference xpathNamedFuncRef,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> argList,
                                                   java.util.List<XMLNSDecl> prefixTable,
                                                   java.util.Vector varVecor,
                                                   int varGlobalsSize,
                                                   ExpressionNode expressionNode,
                                                   XPathContext xctxt)
                                            throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Method definition to evaluate an XPath named function reference.
        Parameters:
        xpathNamedFuncRef - An XPath compiled named function reference object
        argList - List of argument XPath expressions for the function call
        prefixTable - An XML prefix table list object reference containing an XSL context namespace binding information.
        varVecor - Variable name declaration vector
        varGlobalsSize - Variable declaration count information
        xctxt - An XPath context object
        Returns:
        The result of evaluation of an XPath named function reference.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
